projects.name: Lilith
projects.description: An intuitive and user-friendly Discord bot designed for Diablo 4 enthusiasts, it is being used by over 2,500 servers and 400,000 users

projects.name: Zeki
projects.description: A user-friendly Discord bot seamlessly connected to Paliapedia, enhancing your Discord experience, it is being used by over 150 servers and 10,000 users

projects.name: Aeternum
projects.description: Dive into New World with Aeternum, an intuitive Discord bot connected to New World Database, it is being used by over 8,000 servers and 700,000 users

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Explore my personal website, a showcase of my work and interests. Built with TypeScript, Svelte (Kit), Tailwind CSS, and available as open source

projects.name: Peer-at Code
projects.description: A website to learn programming languages by practicing against other people

projects.name: Lilith LFG
projects.description: Find like-minded gamers for Diablo 4 on Lilith LFG, a platform also used by the Lilith Discord bot community
